data.title: Faculty â€” The Center for Group Studies
data.text:
Our Faculty

The faculty of The Center for Group Studies is a group of mental health professionals from diverse backgrounds with advanced degrees in social work, psychology, psychoanalysis and other mental health disciplines. All have many years of practicing group therapy/leadership in private practice and agency settings. Our faculty regularly present at local, national and international conferences and have published articles in established journals.

Key to Abbreviations:

ABPP American Board of Professional Psychology

AGPA American Group Psychotherapy Association

AGPA-DF AGPA-Distinguished Fellow

AGPA-F AGPA-Fellow

CFAAMFT Clinical Fellow American Association of MFTs

CGA Certified Group Analyst (IGA)

CGP Certified Group Psychotherapist (AGPA)

CP Certified Psychotherapist (FEAP)

DCSW Diplomate in Clinical Social Work

FEAP European Association for Psychotherapy

IGA Institute of Group Psychoanalysis

LCSW Licensed in Clinical Social Work

LMSW Licensed Master of Social Work

LP Licensed Psychoanalyst

LPC Licensed Professional Counselor

LMFT Licensed Marriage and Family Therapist

MFT Marriage and Family Therapist

MSSW Master of Science in Social Work

MSW Master of Social Work

NCPsyA Nationally Certified Psychoanalyst (NAAP)
